thread.title: Amazing Location, beautiful hotel!
thread.title_full: Amazing Location, beautiful hotel! - Review of Hotel Eiffel Segur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: RaphaelleLevy
title: Amazing Location, beautiful hotel!
text: Our stay in Eiffel Segur Hotel was absolutely great. the hotel is beautifully decorated and comfortable. The staff is kind and helpful. I would really recommend it Also try the breakfast... is super yummy and they offer lots of different food. Love Paris xxxx
